title: Hour 1: Mike Schur Rage Quits
description:
Mike Schur joins us and furiously rants against the show while officially resigning as the show's stat intern. Then, we take a look back at the NFL weekend including the Giants and the NFC East standings, Austin Ekeler's friends, and Americans hating math. Plus, Witty makes a proclamation about a Quarterback's future.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
